content: Phase 3.1: Create Order model with status machine
Phase 3.2: Create OrderLineItem model with price snapshots
Phase 3.3: Create PaymentIntent model for tracking payment initiation
Phase 3.4: Create Payment model for successful transactions
Phase 3.5: Create Refund model for audit trail
Phase 3.6: Create OrderPayment join table for 1:N Order:Payment
Phase 3.7: Create Receipt model for printing records
Phase 3.8: Create Shift model with status enum
Phase 3.9: Create CashDrawerEvent model for drawer tracking
Phase 3.10: Create OrderAdjustment model for comps/discounts
Phase 3.11: Create API schemas for all models
Phase 3.12: Create backend/app/models/order.py with status transitions
Phase 3.13: Create backend/app/models/order_line_item.py
Phase 3.14: Create backend/app/models/payment.py
Phase 3.15: Create backend/app/models/refund.py
Phase 3.16: Create backend/app/models/receipt.py
Phase 3.17: Create backend/app/models/shift.py
Phase 3.18: Create backend/app/models/cash_drawer_event.py
Phase 3.19: Create backend/app/models/order_adjustment.py
Phase 3.20: Update models/__init__.py to export new models
Phase 3.21: Create database migrations for all new models
Phase 3.22: Create domain events for Order/Payment/Shift in backend/app/core/events.py
Phase 3.23: Extend WebSocket manager with order/payment events
Phase 3.24: Create backend/app/api/orders.py with CRUD endpoints
Phase 3.25: Create backend/app/api/payments.py with payment processing
Phase 3.26: Create backend/app/api/receipts.py with receipt generation
Phase 3.27: Create backend/app/api/shifts.py with shift management
Phase 3.28: Initialize POS PWA at apps/pos/
Phase 3.29: Create POS main layout with Menu Explorer and Cart
Phase 3.30: Create POS components (CategoryNav, MenuItemGrid, CartPanel, etc.)
Phase 3.31: Create POS hooks (useOrders, useCart, usePayment)
Phase 3.32: Create POS types (Order, OrderLineItem, Payment, CartItem)
Phase 3.33: Create POS API client (api/orders.ts, api/payments.ts)
Phase 3.34: Create POS PWA manifest and config
Phase 3.35: Update backend/app/main.py to register new routers
Phase 3.36: Create PHASE_3_COMPLETION.md documentation
